title: [GAMEPLAY] Heartseeker Ashe's Ultimate is Invisible
body:
In-game when Heartseeker Ashe fires her ultimate, all that is visible is the particle effects of the ult, not the arrow.

Recreation Steps:
1. Choose Ashe and select the Heartseeker Ashe skin.
2. Reach level 6
3. Fire Ultimate, observe that the arrow is not visible and only the particle effects of the ult are visible.

This makes the skin unbalanced from the normal default skin since it is hard to see and is unfair.

Thanks.

replies.body: @Riot KateyKhaos  its kinda a disgrace that you posted that comment 4 months ago en that the bug is still there. How about you disable the skin whilst you work on it?
The bug is still live, just lost to ashe who's arrow I could not see at all.. Just the small glitter
Thanks for the report! We'll look into it and see what's going on with her arrow.
